actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $6,000 the amount of outside earnings which, subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provision, is permitted an individual each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $6,000 the amount of outside earnings which is permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits under Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance Benefits) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $6,000 the amount of outside earnings which, subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provision, is permitted an individual each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
